column4: it is possible to include the password in a command? i want to launch an application at startup and i want to not type the password, now i use :gksudo firestarter
sudo firestarter will start it as root , or it should if I recal correctly
i will edit the Ip tables when i have more time to try and experiment with them, i use firestarter just to share the internet
it will not work with sudo, at least not always
